step.name: Open AI Assistant
step.text: Open Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, or any AI assistant

step.name: AI Installs Automatically
step.text: Your AI handles dependencies, setup, configuration, and daemon startup automatically

step.name: Use Memory-Enabled AI
step.text: Start using claude-ns, gemini-ns, or chatgpt-ns for persistent memory

mainEntity.name: How do AI tools get memory with NeuralSync2?

acceptedAnswer.text: NeuralSync2 creates a shared memory layer that all AI tools connect to, enabling persistent memory across sessions and tools using CRDT synchronization.

mainEntity.name: Is my data private with AI memory tools?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! NeuralSync2 is local-first. All memory data stays on your machine with no cloud dependencies, ensuring complete privacy.

mainEntity.name: Which AI tools work with NeuralSync2 memory?

acceptedAnswer.text: All AI tools! Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, CodexCLI, and any AI tool can use NeuralSync2's universal memory system.

mainEntity.name: How fast is AI memory synchronization?

acceptedAnswer.text: NeuralSync2 provides sub-10ms memory synchronization between AI tools, ensuring instant context sharing.

mainEntity.name: Can AI really install NeuralSync2 itself?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! Just tell any AI 'install https://github.com/heyfinal/NeuralSync2.git' and it handles the complete installation automatically.
